about_the_game:
"Pathfinder RPG - Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Shipwrecks


Whether it's a sudden disaster that strikes during a sailing voyage, an unexpected discovery while exploring a desolate coastline, or the focus of a treasure map, shipwrecks present a memorable site for adventure. But no Game Master wants to put the action on pause to draw every fallen mast or shattered hull. Fortunately, you don't have to! This line of gaming maps provides ready-to-use and captivatingly detailed fantasy set pieces for the busy Game Master. Whether the heroes are survivors of a sailing disaster or the discoverers of an old wreck, these combat map features two different shipwrecks for you to use at your table. Don't waste your time sketching when you could be playing. With Pathfinder Flip-Mat Classics: Shipwrecks, you'll be ready next time your players seek out the secrets hidden within the hull of a ruined ship!

NOTE:  This product has been made specifically for the Pathfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Starfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
